pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Super Hydrating Gentle Wash 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Lather this light soap free formulation to remove oil, dirt and impurities without stripping the skin of its natural oils.  Moisture rich to visibly improve skin texture and excellent at helping to relieve dry & sensitive skin on both body and face.  Enjoy nourished, supple and healthy skin that hydrates continuously and wear your skin with pride.   

Skin soothing & nourishing suitable for all skin types including:

• Normal, dry & very dry
• Sensitive
• Dermatitis & Eczema prone skin
• Ideal for baby & infants

Advanced skincare technology formulation:
o Lanolin Hydro Technology – 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin – Hydrate, Restore & Protect
o Soap free
o Fragrance & colour free
o Dermatologically tested
o pH balanced

Lanolin Hydro Technology - 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin.
? Uber-moisturising super-hydrator lanolin carries 200% of its weight in water to infuse the skin with moisture. 
? Restore the skin lipids by assisting their function to hold moisture within the skin.
? Protect with a barrier on the skins surface locking moisture in and irritants out.

Warnings

Store below 30°C.
Recycable
External Use Only

Common Uses

Nourishing Light Texture Body Cleanser

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) , Sodium Laureth Sulfate , Cocamidopropyl Betaine , Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate , PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate , Ceteareth-20 , Lanolin, Polysorbate 20 , Citric Acid ,Sodium Chloride ,Potassium Sorbate
Sodium Benzoate.

Directions

Apply to wet skin and lather gently. Rinse. Soap free for daily use.  For best results use in conjunction with Alpha Keri oil & moisturises.
